name: Syphon Virtual Screen
caveats:
To use different resolutions modify EWProxyFramebuffer.kext/Contents/Info.plist

To install and/or use #<Cask::Cask:0x00007fc3dde5ce98> you may need to enable their kernel extension in

  System Preferences → Security & Privacy → General

For more information refer to vendor documentation or the Apple Technical Note:

  [4mhttps://developer.apple.com/library/content/technotes/tn2459/_index.html[24m
